page.title: 13Byrkley Park
page.content: Byrkley Park used to have a large {Hall}on the land, when it was owned by {William Bass,}but it was demolished many years ago. Where I live used to be the{laundry and across our yard is what used to be a{school}for the workers children. My next door neighbour lives in what used to be the{stables.} When you go down the drive and over a cattle grid there's a{lake.}It has got a lot of fish in it. I like taking our dog for walks with my Dad. Sometimes I help him feed the stock. It is nice where I live. I like it a lot. It is about a mile from the main road and is surrounded by fields. In the Spring these fields are full of pheasants.
